text: Assegai can mean: *assegai, a type of spear *Assegai (novel), a novel by Wilbur Smith *The African tree Curtisia dentata, whose wood is suitable for making spears or lances *Assegai Developments, a South African anti-gravity racing team in the Wipeout series of video games ==Or see== *Assagai, 1970s Afro-rock band, formed in London *Assagai (horse), American Thoroughbred racehorse *Assegaj, a monotypic genus of moths in the family Cossidae
title: Assegai (disambiguation)
